Module io.inverno.mod.base
Package io.inverno.mod.base.converter

Class ObjectDecoder

java.lang.Object
io.inverno.mod.base.converter.ObjectDecoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Decoder<Object,Object>, PrimitiveDecoder<Object>, SplittableDecoder<Object,Object>, SplittablePrimitiveDecoder<Object>
public class ObjectDecoder extends Object implements SplittablePrimitiveDecoder<Object>

Object to object Decoder implementation.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
